name: Lamon the Painter
description:
Help Lamon (definitely a lemon) paint the grey tiles yellow to open the door. There are many obstacles in the way.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Action

R - Restart

Hope you enjoy! :D

Made in 48 hours for Paint Jam 2020.

Used only MS Paint for graphics, using only the default colours of MS Paint and used only Comic Sans as the in game font.
